Title: Relates to prohibiting the construction of certain energy storage systems within five hundred feet of a school or dwelling in a city of one million or more
Summary: Prohibits the construction or maintenance of energy storage systems capable of storing more than twenty kilowatt hours within five hundred feet of a school or dwelling in a city with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to prohibiting the construction and maintenance of certain energy storage systems within five hundred feet of a school or dwelling in a city with a population of one million or more
